title: 1.2. Accessing the Editor
intro: The Template Editor allows individuals to create, manage Templates and to perform a variety of Enterprise-managed process flow Tasks on those Templates. In this section we will outline the various user interface elements, what they do and how to access them.

blocks.content: To access the Template Editor simply navigate via the top menu of the FieldLogs website by selecting 'Templates'.
Alternatively and if you have not done so already, you can follow through the Quickstart steps to familiarize yourself with the various screens and concepts of FieldLogs.com
Below we have broken down the Template Editor into it's key segments & interface elements. The Template list on the left of the screen can be collapsed by tapping the icon.
